cards.description: The world belongs to whoever's best at crackin' skulls and impregnatin' lasses.
cards.name: Yarpen Zigrin

cards.description: If I'm to die today, I wish to look smashing for the occasion.
cards.name: Keira Metz
Redanian Foot Soldier
cards.description: I've bled for Redania! I've killed for Redania... Dammit, I've even raped for Redania!
His eyes flashed under his winged helmet. Fire gleamed from his sword's blade.
cards.name: Cahir Mawr Dyffryn aep Ceallach
Redanian Foot Soldier
cards.description: I've bled for Redania! I've killed for Redania... Dammit, I've even raped for Redania!

cards.name: Poor Fucking Infantry
cards.description: I's a war veteran! ... spare me a crown?

cards.name: Blue Stripes Commando
cards.description: I'd do anything for Temeria. Mostly, though, I kill for her.

cards.name: Sheldon Skaggs
cards.description: I was there, on the front lines! Right where the fightin' was the thickest!

cards.name: Thaler
cards.description: Fuck off! We aren't all ploughin' philanderers. Some of us have depth...

cards.name: Kaedweni Siege Expert
cards.description: 'You gotta recalibrate the arm by five degrees.' 'Do what by the what now?'

cards.name: Sabrina Glevissig
cards.description: The Daughter of the Kaedweni Wilderness.

cards.name: Sigismund Dijkstra
cards.description: Gwent's like politics, just more honest.

cards.name: Dun Banner Medic
cards.description: Stitch red to red, white to white, and everything will be all right.

cards.name: Crinfrid Reavers Dragon Hunter
cards.description: Haven't had much luck with monsters of late, so we enlisted.

cards.name: Prince Stennis
cards.description: He ploughin' wears golden armor. Golden. 'Course he's an arsehole.

cards.name: Sheala de Tancarville
cards.description: The Lodge lacks humility. Our lust for power may yet be our undoing.

cards.name: Trebuchet
cards.description: Castle won't batter itself down, now will it? Get them trebuchets rollin'!

cards.name: Siegfried of Denesle
cards.description: We're on the same side, witcher. You'll realize this one day.

cards.name: Ves
cards.description: Better to live one day as a king than a whole life as a beggar.

cards.name: Siege Tower
cards.description: I love the clamor of siege towers in the morning. Sounds like victory.

cards.name: Ballista
cards.description: 'Usually we give 'em female names.' 'Like Jenny?' 'More like Bertha.'

cards.name: Trebuchet
cards.description: Castle won't batter itself down, now will it? Get them trebuchets rollin'!

cards.name: Dethmold
cards.description: I once made a prisoner vomit his own entrails... Ah, good times...

cards.name: Catapult
cards.description: The gods help those who have better catapults.

cards.name: Philippa Eilhart
cards.description: Soon the power of kings will wither, and the Lodge shall seize its rightful place.

cards.name: Esterad Thyssen
cards.description: Like all Thyssen men, he was tall, powerfully built and criminally handsome.

cards.name: John Natalis
cards.description: That square should bear the names of my soldiers, of the dead. Not mine.

cards.name: Vernon Roche
cards.description: A patriot... and a real son of a bitch.

cards.name: Impera Brigade Guard
cards.description: The Impera Brigade never surrenders. Ever.

cards.name: Puttkammer
cards.description: Learned a lot at Braibant Military Academy. How to scrub potatoes, for instance.

cards.name: Rotten Mangonel
cards.description: The rotten smell brings back childhood memories

cards.name: Stefan Skellen
cards.description: My mark scars the face of our future empress. That is my proudest achievement.

cards.name: Heavy Zerrikanian Fire Scorpion
cards.description: Not the best for taking cities, but great for razing them to the ground.

cards.name: Black Infantry Archer
cards.description: I aim for the knee. Always.

cards.name: Tibor Eggebracht
cards.description: Albaaaa! Forward!! Alba! Long live the Emperor!

cards.name: Young Emissary
cards.description: If I acquit myself well, perhaps next they'll post me somewhere civilized.

cards.name: Zerrikanian Fire Scorpion
cards.description: The Zerrikania Desert used to be a lush garden. Then these came along.

cards.name: Renuald aep Matsen
cards.description: They say the Impera fear nothing. Untrue. Renuald scares them shitless.

cards.name: Siege Engineer
cards.description: Wielded correctly, a protractor can be a deadly weapon.

cards.name: Fringilla Vigo
cards.description: Magic is the highest good. It transcends all borders and divisions.

cards.name: Assire var Anahid
cards.description: Nilfgaardian mages do have a choice: servile submission, or the gallows.

cards.name: Shilard Fitz-Oesterlen
cards.description: Warfare is mere sound and fury - diplomacy is what truly shapes history.

cards.name: Menno Coehorn
cards.description: I'll take an attentive reconnaissance unit over a fine cavalry brigade any day.

cards.name: Vattier de Rideaux
cards.description: There's never been a problem a well-planned assassination couldn't solve.

cards.name: Morvran Voorhis
cards.description: Summer sun reflecting in the quiet waters of the Alba - that's Nilfgaard to me.

cards.name: Black Infantry Archer
cards.description: I aim for the knee. Always.

cards.name: Young Emissary
cards.description: If I acquit myself well, perhaps next they'll post me somewhere civilized.

cards.name: Commander's Horn
cards.description: Plus one to morale, minus three to hearing.

cards.name: Mysterious Elf
cards.description: You humans have... unusual tastes.

cards.name: Dandelion
cards.description: Dandelion, you're a cynic, a lecher, a whoremonger, a liar - and my best friend.

cards.name: Emiel Regis Rohellec Terzieff
cards.description: Men, the polite ones, at least, would call me a monster. A blood-drinking freak.

cards.name: Zoltan Chivay
cards.description: Life without old mates and booze is like a woman without a rump.

cards.name: Olgierd von Everec
cards.description: At least you now know I don't easily lose my head.

cards.name: Vesemir
cards.description: If you're to be hanged, ask for water. Anything can happen before they fetch it.

cards.name: Villentretenmerth
cards.description: Also calls himself Borkh Three Jackdaws... he's not the best at names.

cards.name: Triss Merigold
cards.description: I can take care of myself. Trust me.

cards.name: Yennefer of Vengerberg
cards.description: Magic is Chaos, Art and Science. It is a curse, a blessing and a progression.

cards.name: Cirilla Fiona Elen Riannon
cards.description: Know when fairy tales cease to be tales? When people start believing in them.

cards.name: Geralt of Rivia
cards.description: If that's what it takes to save the world, it'd better to let that world die.

cards.name: Decoy
cards.description: When you run out of peasants, decoys also make decent arrow fodder.

cards.name: Scorch
cards.description: Pillars of flame turn the mightiest to ash. All others tremble in shock and awe.

cards.name: Nausicaa Cavalry Rider
cards.description: The Emperor will teach the North discipline.

cards.name: Biting Frost
cards.description: Best part about frost - bodies of the fallen don't rot so quickly.

cards.name: Impenetrable Fog
cards.description: A good commander's dream... a bad one's horror.

cards.name: Torrential Rain
cards.description: Even the rain in this land smells like piss.

cards.name: Clear Weather
cards.description: The sun's shinin', Dromle! The sun's shinin'! Maybe there's hope left after all...

cards.name: Barclay Els
cards.description: Our mead smells like piss, do it? Easy to fix - I'll break your fuckin' nose!

cards.name: Ciaran aep Easnillien
cards.description: The path to freedom is paved in blood, not ink.

cards.name: Dennis Cranmer
cards.description: I know how to carry out orders, so you can shove your advice up your coal chute.

cards.name: Dol Blathanna Archer
cards.description: Take another step, dh'oine. You'd look better with an arrow between your eyes.

cards.name: Dol Blathanna Scout
cards.description: They track like hounds, run like deer and kill like cold-hearted bastards.

cards.name: Dol Blathanna Scout
cards.description: They track like hounds, run like deer and kill like cold-hearted bastards.

cards.name: Dol Blathanna Scout
cards.description: They track like hounds, run like deer and kill like cold-hearted bastards.

cards.name: Dwarven Skirmisher
cards.description: Worked a pickaxe all me life. Battleaxe won't be any trouble.

cards.name: Dwarven Skirmisher
cards.description: Worked a pickaxe all me life. Battleaxe won't be any trouble.

cards.name: Dwarven Skirmisher
cards.description: Worked a pickaxe all me life. Battleaxe won't be any trouble.

cards.name: Eithné
cards.description: The dryad queen has eyes of molten silver, and a heart of cold-forged steel.

cards.name: Elven Skirmisher
cards.description: No matter what you may have heard, elves don't take human scalps. Too much lice.

cards.name: Elven Skirmisher
cards.description: No matter what you may have heard, elves don't take human scalps. Too much lice.

cards.name: Elven Skirmisher
cards.description: No matter what you may have heard, elves don't take human scalps. Too much lice.

cards.name: Filavandrel aen Fidhail
cards.description: Though we are now few and scattered, our hearts burn brighter than ever.

cards.name: Havekar Healer
cards.description: Sure, I'll patch you up. Gonna cost you, though.

cards.name: Havekar Healer
cards.description: Sure, I'll patch you up. Gonna cost you, though.

cards.name: Havekar Healer
cards.description: Sure, I'll patch you up. Gonna cost you, though.

cards.name: Havekar Smuggler
cards.description: I fight for whoever's paying the best. Or whoever's easiest to rob.

cards.name: Havekar Smuggler
cards.description: I fight for whoever's paying the best. Or whoever's easiest to rob.

cards.name: Havekar Smuggler
cards.description: I fight for whoever's paying the best. Or whoever's easiest to rob.

cards.name: Ida Emean aep Sivney
cards.description: I am a Sage. My power lies in possessing knowledge. Not sharing it.

cards.name: Iorveth
cards.description: King or beggar, what's the difference? One dh'oine less.

cards.name: Isengrim Faoiltiarna
cards.description: It dawns on them once they notice my scar: a realization of imminent death.

cards.name: Mahakaman Defender
cards.description: I'm telling ye, we're born fer battle - we slash straight at their knees!

cards.name: Mahakaman Defender
cards.description: I'm telling ye, we're born fer battle - we slash straight at their knees!

cards.name: Mahakaman Defender
cards.description: I'm telling ye, we're born fer battle - we slash straight at their knees!

cards.name: Mahakaman Defender
cards.description: I'm telling ye, we're born fer battle - we slash straight at their knees!

cards.name: Mahakaman Defender
cards.description: I'm telling ye, we're born fer battle - we slash straight at their knees!

cards.name: Milva
cards.description: With each arrow I loose, I think of my da. He'd be proud. I think.

cards.name: Riordain
cards.description: Stare into their eyes, feast on their terror. Then go in for the kill.

cards.name: Saesenthessis
cards.description: Beautiful, pure, fierce - the prefect icon for a rebellion.

cards.name: Schirrú
cards.description: Time to look death in the face.

cards.name: Toruviel
cards.description: I'd gladly kill you from up close, stare in your eyes... But you reek, human.

cards.name: Vrihedd Brigade Recruit
cards.description: Hatred burns brighter than any fire, and cuts deeper than any blade.

cards.name: Vrihedd Brigade Veteran
cards.description: 'Vrihedd? What's that mean?' 'Trouble.'

cards.name: Vrihedd Brigade Veteran
cards.description: 'Vrihedd? What's that mean?' 'Trouble.'

cards.name: Yaevinn
cards.description: We are the drops of rain that together make a ferocious storm.

cards.name: Arachas
cards.description: Ugly - nature's way of saying 'Stay the fuck away.'

cards.name: Arachas
cards.description: Ugly - nature's way of saying 'Stay the fuck away.'

cards.name: Arachas
cards.description: Ugly - nature's way of saying 'Stay the fuck away.'

cards.name: Arachas Behemoth
cards.description: Like a cross between a crab, a spider...and a ploughin' mountain

cards.name: Poroniec
cards.description: Admit your mistakes and bury them proper - else they'll come back to haunt you.

cards.name: Celaeno Harpy
cards.description: Common harpies feed on carrion. Celaeno harpies... they feed on dreams.

cards.name: Cockatrice
cards.description: Born of an egg laid by a cockerel... if you believe such peasant drivel.

cards.name: Crone: Brewess
cards.description: We'll cut you up, boy. A fine broth you will make.

cards.name: Crone: Weavess
cards.description: I sense your pain. I see your fear...

cards.name: Crone: Whispess
cards.description: I'd be your best - and last.

cards.name: Draug
cards.description: Some men cannot admit defeat. Some keep fighting from beyond the grave.

cards.name: Earth Elemental
cards.description: How to fight an earth elemental? You don't. You run. Fast as you can.

cards.name: Endrega
cards.description: The nest! Take out the nest, or the bastards'll just keep coming!

cards.name: Fiend
cards.description: A fiend looks a bit like a deer. An enormous, evil deer.

cards.name: Fire Elemental
cards.description: Fire is so delightful.

cards.name: Foglet
cards.description: Fog creeps on little cat feet. Foglets creep over the bodies of their victims.

cards.name: Forktail
cards.description: Fork tails... Bah! Fuckers' tails're more like cleavers.

cards.name: Frightener
cards.description: 'What have I done?' the mage cried out, frightened of his own creation.

cards.name: Gargoyle
cards.description: Ancient sculptors' nightmarish fantasies, brought to life by bored mages.

cards.name: Ghoul
cards.description: If ghouls are part of the Circle of Life... then it's a damn vicious circle.

cards.name: Ghoul
cards.description: If ghouls are part of the Circle of Life... then it's a damn vicious circle.

cards.name: Ghoul
cards.description: If ghouls are part of the Circle of Life... then it's a damn vicious circle.

cards.name: Grave Hag
cards.description: Their long tongues're for slurping marrow - and whipping prep.

cards.name: Griffin
cards.description: Griffins like to toy with their prey. Eat 'em alive, piece by piece.

cards.name: Harpy
cards.description: There are many species of harpy, and all are kleptomaniacs.

cards.name: Ice Giant
cards.description: Fled one time in my life. From the Ice Giant. And I'm not a bit ashamed.

cards.name: Imlerith
cards.description: Ladd nahw! Kill them! Litter the earth with their entrails!

cards.name: Kayran
cards.description: Kill a kayran? Simple. Take your best sword... then sell it and hire a witcher.

cards.name: Leshen
cards.description: We never hunt in these woods. Not even if it means the whole village starves.

cards.name: Nekker
cards.description: Damn things are almost cute, if you ignore the whole vicious killer aspect.

cards.name: Nekker
cards.description: Damn things are almost cute, if you ignore the whole vicious killer aspect.

cards.name: Nekker
cards.description: Damn things are almost cute, if you ignore the whole vicious killer aspect.

cards.name: Plague Maiden
cards.description: The sick rave about a boil-pocked woman surrounded by herds of rabid rats...

cards.name: Toad
cards.description: Big. Bad. Ugly. Squats in the sewers.

cards.name: Vampire: Bruxa
cards.description: A vile, bloodthirsty, man-eating hag. Kind of like my mother-in-law.

cards.name: Vampire: Ekimmara
cards.description: Who would think overgrown bats would have a taste for gaudy jewelry?

cards.name: Vampire: Fleder
cards.description: Higher vampires embrace their victims. Fleders rip them to shreds.

cards.name: Vampire: Garkain
cards.description: Blood-drinkers and corpse-eaters so foul their very ugliness paralyses foes.

cards.name: Vampire: Katakan
cards.description: Drinking the blood of the Continent since the Conjunction.

cards.name: Werewolf
cards.description: Wolves aren't as bad as they say. Werewolves, though - they're worse.

cards.name: Wyvern
cards.description: Imagine a cross between a winged snake and a nightmare. Wyverns are worse.

cards.name: Roach
cards.description: Come on, Roach! Faster!

cards.name: Gaunter O'Dimm
cards.description: He always grants exactly what you wish for. That's the problem.

cards.name: Gaunter O'Dimm: Darkness
cards.description: Fear not the shadows, but the light.

cards.name: Letho of Gulet
cards.description: Witchers never die in their beds.

cards.name: Albrich
cards.description: A fireball? Of course. Whatever Your Imperial Majesty wishes.

cards.name: Cynthia
cards.description: Cynthia's talents can be deadly. She needs a tight leash.

cards.name: Etolian Auxiliary Archers
cards.description: Double or nothing, aim for his cock.

cards.name: Etolian Auxiliary Archers
cards.description: Double or nothing, aim for his cock.

cards.name: Morteisen
cards.description: No Nordling pikemen or dwarven spearbearers can hope to best trained cavalry.

cards.name: Rainfarn
cards.description: You'll die as painfully as that pathetic traitor Windhalm did.

cards.name: Siege Technician
cards.description: I never miss twice.

cards.name: Sweers
cards.description: And hands off the girl! Whatever we may be, we're not savages.

cards.name: Vanhemar
cards.description: For a fire mage, he's not very... flamboyant.

cards.name: Vreemde
cards.description: Discipline is the Empire's deadliest weapon.
